problem_text_cn: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠BAC=90°,∠ABC=30°,Q是AB上的一点,⊙O分别与AC、BC相切于点A、D,与AB交于另一点E,若BE=2,则切线CD的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠BAC = N_0, ∠ABC = N_1, Q is a point on AB, and ⊙O is tangent to AC and BC at points A and D, and intersects AB at another point E, if BE = N_2, then the length of the tangent CD is ()
raw_answer: 解:连结OD,如图,∵BC为⊙O的切线,∴OD⊥BC,在Rt△OBD中,∵∠B=30°,∴OB=2OD,而OB=OE+BE,∴OD+2=2OD,解得OD=2,∵AC与⊙O相切,∴AE=2OD=4,∴AB=AE+BE=6,在Rt△ABC中,∵∠B=30°,∴AC=\frac{√{3}}{3}AB=2√{3},∴CD=AC=2√{3}．故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了切线的性质:圆的切线垂直于经过切点的半径．若出现圆的切线,必连过切点的半径,构造定理图,得出垂直关系．
